title: Springboard: The Secret History of the First Real Smartphone | Official trailer
description: A decade before Steve Jobs introduced the iPhone, a tiny team of renegades imagined and tried to build the modern smartphone. Nearly forgotten by history, a little startup called Handspring tried to make the future before it was ready. In Springboard: The Secret History of the First Real Smartphone, The Verges Dieter Bohn talks to the visionaries at Handspring and dives into their early successes and eventual failures.   How to watch: Springboard is now streaming worldwide. You can watch it on The Verge's new app on Android TV, Amazon Fire TV, Roku, and Apple TV.
